title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 700.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) Records of the Department of Labor required to be made available for public
inspection and copying under the Freedom of Information Law shall be open to
public access. (b) The public shall
be furnished the information and records required by the Freedom of Information

Law, as well as records otherwise available by law. (c) This Part provides information concerning
the availability of records and the procedures to be followed to obtain access
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
700.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
